path: artifacts/Animal Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.AnimalToken: contracts/Animal Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/AnimalToken

findings.title: Missing Zero Address Check
findings.description: Contracts lack zero address checks, hence are prone to be initialized with zero addresses.

findings.title: Unlocked Pragma
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly. Locking the pragma helps to ensure that contracts do not accidentally get deployed using an outdated compiler version.
